name: Cooking from the Glossies: Balsamic Pork with Shallots
description: I needed a quick and easy meal to make for my cousin last night and this Balsamic Pork with Shallots from the March issue of Cooking Light definitely fit the bill. Easily a 30 minute meal, the recipe is straightforward...

recipeInstructions.text: Add remaining oil to pan; reduce heat to medium. Add shallots to pan; cook 10 minutes or until tender, stirring occasionally. Add garlic; cook 2 minutes. Stir in water and vinegar; simmer 6 minutes. Add salt and pepper to taste. Spoon shallot mixture over pork. Serve immediately.
